985190.name: Lucius III Soundtrack
985190.description:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT

Lucius III Soundtrack. Atmospheric tunes and songs created by Johannes Aikio
(Does not include The House of the Rising Sun by Flute of Shame)

Includes the following tracks:

  • 01 - Between Rock And Fire
  • 02 - Dark Place To Be
  • 03 - Death Beat
  • 04 - Devil's Train
  • 05 - Hitman
  • 06 - It Takes Death To Tango
  • 07 - More Dark Ways
  • 08 - Sultan
  • 09 - The Dark Has Ways
  • 10 - The Darkness Is All Around Us
  • 11 - The Hero Is Alone
  • 12 - The New Wave
  • 13 - Trying Again
  • 14 - Without A Lord Or Master
985190.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语*, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 芬兰语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
